Key Match Events: The Suns are 13-9 against Western Conference opponents and 4-2 in games decided by less than 4 points.
Pre-Game Insights: The Grizzlies rank sixth in Western Conference shooting 36.9% from 3-point range.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Suns make 46.8% of their shots from the field this season, which is 2.6 percentage points higher than the Grizzlies have allowed to their opponents (44.2%). The Grizzlies score 9.5 more points per game (123.4) than the Suns give up (113.9).
